definition: Mr Gram/Dr. Hans Christian Jaochim Gram (1953-1938), Danish doctor and inventor of the Gram stain 革蘭氏染色法|革兰氏染色法
animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
Gram stain (used to distinguished two different kinds of bacteria)
pinyin: Ge2 lan2 shi4 ran3 se4 fa3

definition: Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)

sentences.english: It recognizes lipopolysaccharide, a component of the outer membrane of Gram-negative bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 它识别广泛存在革兰氏阴性菌细胞外膜上的脂多糖。

sentences.english: Staphylococcus is the main strain of gram-positive bacterias.
sentences.chinese: 结论血培养阳性细菌株以革兰氏阴性菌为主。

sentences.english: When checking purulent fluid, can search inside the cell see diplococcus of negative of coloring of change orchid family name.
sentences.chinese: 检查脓液时，在细胞内可找见革兰氏染色阴性双球菌。

sentences.english: Fucidin has a powerful antibacterial activity against a number of gram-positive microorganisms.
sentences.chinese: 立思丁对一系列革兰氏阳性细菌有强大的抗菌作用。

sentences.english: This Gram-positive oval-shaped bacterium is one of the causes of pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 这种椭圆形的革兰氏阳性菌可能引起肺炎。

sentences.english: Ran Chenggong calls bacterium of negative of change orchid family name lubriciously .
sentences.chinese: 染成红色的称为革兰氏阴性菌。

sentences.english: It also has a good antibacterial effect to gram-positive bacterial.
sentences.chinese: 对革兰氏阳性菌具有很好的抗菌作用。

sentences.english: Aim To explore new agents of quinolone derivatives with high activity against Gram-positive organisms.
sentences.chinese: 目的寻找新的高效抗革兰氏阳性菌的喹诺酮类药物。

sentences.english: Conclusion Elsinochrome A had bacteriostasis effects on Gram-positive bacterial growth.
sentences.chinese: 结论痂囊腔菌素A能抑制革兰氏阳性细菌的生长。

sentences.english: Immunohistochemical analysis was also taken for examination of distribution of Bifidobacterium infantis in tissues.
sentences.chinese: 组织切片革兰氏染色，进行图像分析。

sentences.english: The strain was gram negative, ellipse cell, no spores and no flagellum.
sentences.chinese: 菌株细胞呈椭球形，革兰氏阴性，不产芽孢，无鞭毛。

sentences.english: For Gram-positive bacteria and penicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus infection.
sentences.chinese: 用于革兰氏阳性菌及耐青霉素葡萄球菌的感染。

sentences.english: Its mellow extraction has the strong antibacterial function to the Gelanshi masculine bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 其醇提取物对革兰氏阳性细菌有较强的抗菌作用。

sentences.english: Helicobacter pylori is a Gram-negative flagellated spiral bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 幽门螺旋杆菌是一种革兰氏阴性带有鞭毛的螺旋菌。

sentences.english: The pathogenic bacteria were mainly gram-negative bacteria and secondly was fungi.
sentences.chinese: 病原菌主要为革兰氏阴性菌，其次是真菌。

sentences.english: The bacteria are anaerobic, gram-positive, spore-forming rods that produce a potent neurotoxin.
sentences.chinese: 细菌厌氧，革兰氏阳性，孢子形成燃料棒产生强大的。

definition: gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
Gram stain (used to distinguished two different kinds of bacteria)
pinyin: Ge2 lan2 shi4 ran3 se4 fa3

definition: peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)
